s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 2.0.1. If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s2.message: Reverted compatibility info change done in Adblock Plus 2.0.1 (addons.mozilla.org supports it now).

s4.message: Made toolbar icon properly customizable in Thunderbird (forum topic).

s5.message: Fixed: Filter editing is broken in Firefox 3.6 (forum topic).

s6.message: Firefox Mobile: Fixed user interface to handle "non-intrusive ads" feature properly.

s7.message: Firefox Mobile: Fixed: Extension options might be broken if opened too soon after starting the browser.

s8.message: Fixed: "Subscription contains disabled filters" message doesn't get updated on a filter update.

s9.message: Fixed: Toolbar icon's tooltip shouldn't report "non-intrusive ads" as a subscription unless Filter Preferences shows it as such (forum topic).
